nodes.text: Jopari Haines was a male Rodian who worked for the company Genasys during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Haines had became a senior Genasys executive by 32 BBY. When the Cerean scientist Higgie Sethven discovered a new drug and asked to join Genasys, Haines traveled to Cularin, to meet the scientist. He traveled in an armored vehicle and was accompanied by troopers from the Genasys Security Division. However, they were attacked by agents working for Culpharm, a rival company. During the resulting fight, Haines met with the heroes of Cularin and explained the situation to them.
